message: I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round, as the value of the money will decrease rapidly!

I'm offering a 60/40 split in my favor.  While it's less than your initial proposal, it's still a good deal, considering the money is depreciating faster for you. Let's come to an agreement before the value drops too much.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your offer was too greedy considering the inflation.  I'm proposing 65/35. It's a fair deal that gives us both a decent share before the money loses too much value.
